forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny. High near 15C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny. High 59F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally clear. Low 9C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 49F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High near 15C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 59F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with occasional rain...mainly in the evening. Low 11C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Periods of rain early. Low 52F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny. High 14C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 58F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 8C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 46F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High around 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 58F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low around 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low near 50F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High near 15C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 58F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 48F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 14C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 57F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 48F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 58F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low around 10C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 49F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds WNW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 46F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies in the evening then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 7C. NNW winds shifting to E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low near 45F. NNW winds shifting to E at 10 to 15 mph.
